title: Rewind Spell
desc:
Post 114
- Reset your healthbar to what it was at the start of the game.
- Discard all your items; then, draw the same # of items as you started with.
- **Have a Nice Death**
 - Gain a random **Have a Nice Death** item upon use UNLESS below condition applies AND you got this item from this attribute.
 - Immediately skip your turn instead of resetting your <:charge:1240849067362488403>s and items if you've already used 2+ **Have a Nice Death** items this game.
